languages.text: Чудовищное предательство Вольного Торговца показало всем, сколь опасны исповедуемую {mf|им|ею} так называемые "идеалы милосердия". Дорога от снисхождения ко греху до нисхождения во грех оказалась коротка, и урок этот был усвоен. В Просторе было навек забыто слово "милость".

The abominable betrayal by the Rogue Trader showed everyone how dangerous {mf|his|her} so-called "ideals of mercy" were. Indulging in mercy was but a short step away from embracing moral depravity outright. The Expanse learned this lesson well, and the word "mercy" was never again uttered there.
languages.original_text: Чудовищное предательство Вольного Торговца показало всем, сколь опасны исповедуемую {mf|им|ею} так называемые "идеалы милосердия". Дорога от снисхождения ко греху до нисхождения во грех оказалась коротка, и урок этот был усвоен. В Просторе было навек забыто слово "милость".

traits.locale_text: The abominable Rogue Trader's betrayal showed everyone, how dangerous were {mf|his|her} so-called "ideals of mercy". Compassion to sin was the first step on a very short road to embracing sin. This lesson was learned. The word "mercy" in the Expanse was forgotten for good.

The abominable Rogue Trader's betrayal showed everyone, how dangerous were {mf|his|her} so-called "ideals of mercy". Compassion to sin was the first step on a very short road to embracing sin. This lesson was learned. The word "mercy" in the Expanse was forgotten for good.

The abominable Rogue Trader's betrayal showed everyone how dangerous {mf|his|her} so-called "ideals of mercy" were. The road to embracing transgression was short indeed. This lesson was learned. The word "mercy" came to mean nothing in the Expanse.

The abominable Rogue Trader's betrayal showed everyone how dangerous {mf|his|her} so-called "ideals of mercy" were. The road to embracing transgression was short indeed. This lesson was learned. The word "mercy" came to mean nothing in the Expanse.

The abominable betrayal by the Rogue Trader showed everyone how dangerous {mf|his|her} so-called "ideals of mercy" were. Indulging in mercy was but a short step away from embracing moral depravity outright. The Expanse learned this lesson well, and the word "mercy" was never again uttered there.

The abominable betrayal by the Rogue Trader showed everyone how dangerous {mf|his|her} so-called "ideals of mercy" were. Indulging in mercy was but a short step away from embracing moral depravity outright. The Expanse learned this lesson well, and the word "mercy" was never again uttered there.

languages.text: 行商浪人可憎的背叛让所有人意识到，{mf|他|她}所谓的“仁慈理想”是多么危险。所谓的仁慈离彻底踏上异端之路只有一步之遥。整个科罗努斯扩区都吸取了这个教训，“仁慈”这个词在科罗努斯扩区变得一文不值。
languages.original_text: The abominable betrayal by the Rogue Trader showed everyone how dangerous {mf|his|her} so-called "ideals of mercy" were. Indulging in mercy was but a short step away from embracing moral depravity outright. The Expanse learned this lesson well, and the word "mercy" was never again uttered there.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人可憎的背叛让所有人意识到，{mf|他|她}所谓的“仁慈理想”是多么危险。这条越界的道路很快就遭到了终结，人们也吸取了教训。从此之后，“仁慈”这个词在科罗努斯扩区中变得一文不值。

languages.text: Der schändliche Verrat {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zeigte allen, wie gefährlich {mf|seine|ihre} so genannten "Ideale der Gnade" waren. Gnade zu zeigen, war nur einen winzigen Schritt davon entfernt, sich offen moralischer Verkommenheit hinzugeben. Die Ausdehnung hat diese Lektion verinnerlicht und das Wort 'Gnade' wurde hier nie wieder ausgesprochen.
languages.original_text: The abominable betrayal by the Rogue Trader showed everyone how dangerous {mf|his|her} so-called "ideals of mercy" were. Indulging in mercy was but a short step away from embracing moral depravity outright. The Expanse learned this lesson well, and the word "mercy" was never again uttered there.

traits.locale_text: Der Verrat {mf|des schändlichen Freihändlers|der schändlichen Freihändlerin} zeigte allen, wie gefährlich {mf|seine|ihre} so genannten "Ideale der Gnade" waren. Der Weg zur Sünde war kurz, sehr kurz. Diese Lektion wurde gelernt. Das Wort "Gnade" verlor in der Ausdehnung jede Bedeutung.

languages.text: L'abominable trahison {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} révéla à tous combien ses prétendus « idéaux de miséricorde » étaient dangereux, prouvant que ceux qui se laissent aller à la clémence ne sont qu'à deux doigts d'embrasser l'immoralité. Tous retinrent la leçon et le terme « miséricorde » ne fut plus jamais prononcé dans les Étendues.
languages.original_text: The abominable betrayal by the Rogue Trader showed everyone how dangerous {mf|his|her} so-called "ideals of mercy" were. Indulging in mercy was but a short step away from embracing moral depravity outright. The Expanse learned this lesson well, and the word "mercy" was never again uttered there.

traits.locale_text: L'abominable trahison {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} révéla à tous combien ses prétendus « idéaux de miséricorde » étaient dangereux, prouvant que ceux qui se laissent aller à la clémence ne sont qu'à deux doigts d'embrasser l'immoralité. Tous retinrent la leçon et le terme « miséricorde » ne fut plus jamais prononcé dans les Étendues.

languages.text: La traición de{mf|l| la} abominable Comerciante Independiente demostró a todos lo peligrosos que eran sus supuestos «ideales piadosos». Permitir dicha «piedad» dejó la Extensión a poco más de un paso de aceptar abiertamente la depravación moral, y fue así como esta palabra no volvió a escucharse en su territorio.
languages.original_text: The abominable betrayal by the Rogue Trader showed everyone how dangerous {mf|his|her} so-called "ideals of mercy" were. Indulging in mercy was but a short step away from embracing moral depravity outright. The Expanse learned this lesson well, and the word "mercy" was never again uttered there.

traits.locale_text: La traición de{mf|l| la} abominable Comerciante Independiente demostró a todos lo peligrosos que eran sus supuestos «ideales piadosos». El camino hacia la aceptación de las transgresiones fue muy breve, pero la lección no se olvidó. La palabra «piedad» perdió todo significado en la Extensión.

languages.text: 忌まわしい自由開拓者の裏切りは、{mf|彼|彼女}が「慈悲の理念」と称したものがいかに危険なものであるかを皆に示した。慈悲に甘えることは、道徳的な堕落を無条件に受け入れることへの近道に過ぎなかったのだ。この教訓に学び、エクスパンスでは「慈悲」という言葉は二度と口にされることはなくなった。
languages.original_text: The abominable betrayal by the Rogue Trader showed everyone how dangerous {mf|his|her} so-called "ideals of mercy" were. Indulging in mercy was but a short step away from embracing moral depravity outright. The Expanse learned this lesson well, and the word "mercy" was never again uttered there.

traits.locale_text: 忌まわしい自由開拓者の裏切りは、{mf|彼|彼女}が「慈悲の理念」と称したものがいかに危険なものであるかを皆に示した。慈悲に甘えることは、道徳的な堕落を無条件に受け入れることへの近道に過ぎなかったのだ。この教訓に学び、エクスパンスでは「慈悲」という言葉は二度と口にされることはなくなった。

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in adice ihaneti, sözde "merhamet ülkülerinin" ne kadar tehlikeli olduğunu herkese gösterdi. Merhametten haz almak, onun için ahlaki çöküşe kucak açmaktan pek de farklı olmadı. Enginlik, bu dersi çok iyi öğrendi ve "merhamet" kelimesi burada bir daha ağza alınmadı.
languages.original_text: The abominable betrayal by the Rogue Trader showed everyone how dangerous {mf|his|her} so-called "ideals of mercy" were. Indulging in mercy was but a short step away from embracing moral depravity outright. The Expanse learned this lesson well, and the word "mercy" was never again uttered there.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir'in adice ihaneti, onun sözde "merhamet ülkülerinin" ne kadar tehlikeli olduğunu herkese gösterdi. Merhametten haz almak, onun için ahlaki çöküşe kucak açmaktan çok farklı olmadı. Enginlik bu dersi çok iyi öğrendi ve "merhamet" kelimesi burada bir daha ağza alınmadı.
